name: LD2000 Vs CSxTBM: Slam Mayhem 2021: Dolmexica Infinite
name_original: LD2000 Vs CSxTBM: Slam Mayhem 2021: Dolmexica Infinite
description:
This is Dolmexica Infinite version of LD2000 Vs CSxTBM: Slam Mayhem 2021.

Note: This is Dolmexica Infinite mod, which in turn is a Mugen interpreter for Windows.

Controls for Windows:

  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Weak punch - Q
  • Medium punch - W
  • Strong punch - E
  • Weak kick - A
  • Medium kick - S
  • Strong kick - D
  • Start - Enter
  • Full screen: CTRL + Enter
  • Return to title screen / Exit the game from title screen- Escape

Additional notes:

  • KFM stage made by Elecbyte: http://www.elecbyte.com/mugendocs-11b1/mugen.html
  • Character sources: Maavo, Sunset Shimmer, Heavy Weapons Guy, Curly Brace, Parappa, Alice Margatroid, Remiu Hakurei, Taylor, Blossom, Mega Man X
  • Stage sources: LD2KvCxT Training Facility, LD2000 Wreslting Arena, Sand Zone Residence, Chop Chop's Dojo, CSxTBM Wreslting Arena, Abandoned Factory, Canadian River Ride

Thanks for playing!
